import apiUrl from'../apiConfig';import axios from'axios';// POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS POEMS 
export var createPoem=function createPoem(data,user){return axios({method:'POST',url:apiUrl+'/poems/',data:{poem:data},headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var indexPoems=function indexPoems(user){return axios({method:'GET',url:apiUrl+'/poems/',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var showPoem=function showPoem(id,user){return axios({method:'GET',url:apiUrl+'/poems/'+id,headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var deletePoem=function deletePoem(id,user){return axios({method:'DELETE',url:apiUrl+'/poems/'+id,headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var updatePoem=function updatePoem(data,id,user){return axios({method:'PATCH',url:apiUrl+'/poems/'+id+'/',data:{poem:data},headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};// PUBLIC POEMS PUBLIC POEMS PUBLIC POEMS 
export var indexPublicPoems=function indexPublicPoems(user){return axios({method:'GET',url:apiUrl+'/publicpoems/',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var indexPublicWords=function indexPublicWords(user){return axios({method:'GET',url:apiUrl+'/publicwords/',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};// WORDS WORDS WORDS WORDS WORDS WORDS WORDS WORDS WORDS WORDS 
export var indexWords=function indexWords(id,user){return axios({method:'GET',url:apiUrl+'/poems/'+id+'/words/',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var createWord=function createWord(data,id,user){return axios({method:'POST',url:apiUrl+'/poems/'+id+'/words/',data:{word:data},headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var deleteWord=function deleteWord(poemId,wordId,user){return axios({method:'DELETE',url:apiUrl+'/poems/'+poemId+'/words/'+wordId+'/',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};export var getWordList=function getWordList(user){return axios({method:'GET',url:apiUrl+'/wordlist/',headers:{Authorization:"Token ".concat(user.token)}});};
